[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2429[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2430[0m[39m:  - Subscribe to <mailto:wireshark-dev[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mAT[0m[1;39m][0m[39mwireshark.org> by sending an email [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2431[0m[39m:    <mailto:wireshark-dev-request[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mAT[0m[1;39m][0m[39mwireshark.org?[0m[33mbody[0m[39m=[0m[32m"help"[0m[39m> or visiting[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2432[0m[39m:    <[0m[4;94mhttps://lists.wireshark.org/[0m[39m>.[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2433[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2434[0m[39m:  - [0m[32m'git diff'[0m[39m to verify all your changes look good.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2435[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2436[0m[39m:  - [0m[32m'git add'[0m[39m all the files you changed.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2437[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2438[0m[39m:  - [0m[32m'git commit'[0m[39m to commit [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlocally[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m your changes. First line of commit [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmessage[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2439[0m[39m:    should be a summary of the changes followed by an empty line and a more[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2440[0m[39m:    verbose description.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2441[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2442[0m[39m:  - [0m[32m'git push downstream [0m[1;33mHEAD[0m[32m'[0m[39m to push the changes to GitLab. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mThis assumes[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2443[0m[39m:    that you have a remote named [0m[32m"downstream"[0m[39m that points to a fork of[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2444[0m[39m:    [0m[4;94mhttps://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark.[0m[4;94m)[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2445[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2446[0m[39m:  - Create a Wiki page on the protocol at [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[4;94mhttps://gitlab.com/wireshark/editor-wiki[0m[39m>.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2447[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m([0m[39mYou'll need to request access to [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [4;94mhttps://gitlab.com/wireshark/wiki-editors.[0m[4;94m)[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2448[0m[39m:    A template is provided so it is easy to setup in a consistent style.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2449[0m[39m:      See: <[0m[4;94mhttps://wiki.wireshark.org/HowToEdit[0m[39m>[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2450[0m[39m:      and  <[0m[4;94mhttps://wiki.wireshark.org/ProtocolReference[0m[39m>[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2451[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2452[0m[39m:  - If possible, add sample capture files to the sample captures page at[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2453[0m[39m:    <[0m[4;94mhttps://wiki.wireshark.org/SampleCaptures[0m[39m>. These[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2454[0m[39m:    files are used by the automated build system for fuzz testing.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2455[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2456[0m[39m:  - If you don't think the wiki is the right place for your sample capture,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2457[0m[39m:    submit a bug report to the Wireshark issue database, found at[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2458[0m[39m:    <[0m[4;94mhttps://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark/-/issues[0m[39m>, qualified as an[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2459[0m[39m:    enhancement and attach your sample capture there. Normally a new[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2460[0m[39m:    dissector won't be accepted without a sample capture! If you open a[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2461[0m[39m:    bug be sure to cross-link your GitLab merge request.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2462[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2463:2[0m[39m. Advanced dissector topics.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2464[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2465:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m Introduction.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2466[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2467[0m[39m:Some of the advanced features are being worked on constantly. When using them[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2468[0m[39m:it is wise to check the relevant header and source files for additional [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdetails.[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2469[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2470:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m Following [0m[32m"conversations"[0m[39m.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2471[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2472[0m[39m:In Wireshark a conversation is defined as a series of data packets between two[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2473:add[0m[39mress:port combinations. A conversation is not sensitive to the direction of[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2474[0m[39m:the packet. The same conversation will be returned for a packet bound from[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2475[0m[39m:Server[0m[1;92mA:1000[0m[39m to Client[0m[1;92mA:2000[0m[39m and the packet from Client[0m[1;92mA:2000[0m[39m to Server[0m[1;92mA:1000[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2476[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2477:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m Conversation Routines[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2478[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2479[0m[39m:There are nine routines that you will use to work with a conversation:[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2480:c[0m[39monversation_new, conversation_new_full, find_conversation,[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2481:f[0m[39mind_conversation_full, find_or_create_conversation,[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2482:c[0m[39monversation_add_proto_data, conversation_get_proto_data,[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2483:c[0m[39monversation_delete_proto_data, and conversation_set_dissector.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2484[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2485:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m The conversation_init function.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2486[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2487[0m[39m:This is an internal routine for the conversation code. As such you[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2488[0m[39m:will not have to call this routine. Just be aware that this routine is[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2489:ca[0m[39mlled at the start of each capture and before the packets are filtered[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2490[0m[39m:with a display filter. The routine will destroy all stored[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2491:c[0m[39monversations. This routine does NOT clean up any data pointers that are[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2492[0m[39m:passed in the conversation_add_proto_data [0m[32m'data'[0m[39m variable. You are[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2493[0m[39m:responsible for this clean up if you pass a malloc'ed pointer[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2494[0m[39m:in this variable.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2495[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2496[0m[39m:See item [0m[1;92m2.2.1.5[0m[39m for more information about use of the [0m[32m'data'[0m[39m pointer.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2497[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2498[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2499:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m The conversation_new function.[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2500[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2501[0m[39m:This routine will create a new conversation based upon two address/port[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2502[0m[39m:pairs. If you want to associate with the conversation a pointer to a[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2503[0m[39m:private data structure you must use the conversation_add_proto_data[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2504:f[0m[39munction. The ctype variable is used to differentiate between[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2505:c[0m[39monversations over different protocols, i.e. TCP and UDP. The options[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2506[0m[39m:variable is used to define a conversation that will accept any destination[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2507:add[0m[39mress and/or port. Set options = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m if the destination port and address[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2508:a[0m[39mre known when conversation_new is called. See section [0m[1;36m2.4[0m[39m for more[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2509[0m[39m:information on usage of the options parameter.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2510[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2511[0m[39m:The conversation_new prototype:[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2512[0m[39m:    conversation_t *[0m[1;35mconversation_new[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t setup_frame, address *addr1,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2513[0m[39m:        address *addr2, conversation_type ctype, uint32_t port1, uint32_t [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mport2,[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2514[0m[39m:        unsigned options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2515[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2516[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2517[0m[39m:    uint32_t setup_frame     = The lowest numbered frame for this conversation[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2518[0m[39m:    address* addr1           = first data packet address[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2519[0m[39m:    address* addr2           = second data packet address[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2520[0m[39m:    conversation_type ctype  = conversation type, defined in conversation.h[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2521[0m[39m:    uint32_t port1           = first data packet port[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2522[0m[39m:    uint32_t port2           = second data packet port[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2523[0m[39m:    unsigned options         = conversation options, NO_ADDR2 and/or NO_PORT2[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2524[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2525[0m[39m:setup_frame indicates the first frame for this conversation, and is used to[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2526:d[0m[39mistinguish multiple conversations with the same addr1/port1 and addr2/port2[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2527[0m[39m:pair that occur within the same capture session.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2528[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2529[0m[39m:[0m[32m"addr1"[0m[39m and [0m[32m"port1"[0m[39m are the first address/port pair; [0m[32m"addr2"[0m[39m and [0m[32m"port2"[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2530:a[0m[39mre the second address/port pair. A conversation doesn't have source[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2531:a[0m[39mnd destination address/port pairs - packets in a conversation go in[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2532:b[0m[39moth directions - so [0m[32m"addr1"[0m[35m/[0m[32m"port1"[0m[39m may be the source or destination[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2533:add[0m[39mress/port pair; [0m[32m"addr2"[0m[35m/[0m[32m"port2"[0m[39m would be the other pair.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2534[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2535[0m[39m:If NO_ADDR2 is specified, the conversation is set up so that a[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2536:c[0m[39monversation lookup will match only the [0m[32m"addr1"[0m[39m address; if NO_PORT2 is[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2537[0m[39m:specified, the conversation is set up so that a conversation lookup will[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2538[0m[39m:match only the [0m[32m"port1"[0m[39m port; if both are specified, i.e.[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2539[0m[39m:NO_ADDR2|NO_PORT2, the conversation is set up so that the lookup will[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2540[0m[39m:match only the [0m[32m"addr1"[0m[35m/[0m[32m"port1"[0m[39m address/port pair. This can be used if a[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2541[0m[39m:packet indicates that, later in the capture, a conversation will be[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2542:c[0m[39mreated using certain addresses and ports, in the case where the packet[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2543:d[0m[39moesn't specify the addresses and ports of both sides.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2544[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2545:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m3[0m[39m The conversation_new_full function.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2546[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2547[0m[39m:This routine will create a new conversation based upon an arbitrary[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2548[0m[39m:lists of elements. Elements can be addresses, strings, unsigned[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2549[0m[39m:integers, or unsigned [0m[1;36m64[0m[39m-bit integers. Unlike conversation_new, element[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2550[0m[39m:lists are matched strictly; wildcards aren't [0m[1;39m([0m[39myet[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m supported.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2551[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2552[0m[39m:The conversation_new_full prototype:[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2553[0m[39m:    conversation_t *[0m[1;35mconversation_new_full[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconst uint32_t setup_frame,[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2554[0m[39m:        conversation_element_t *elements[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2555[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2556[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2557[0m[39m:    uint32_t setup_frame             = The lowest numbered frame for[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2558[0m[39m:        this conversation[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2559[0m[39m:    conversation_element_t *elements = An array of data types and[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2560[0m[39m:        values which identify this conversation. The array MUST be[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2561[0m[39m:        terminated with a CE_ENDPOINT element.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2562[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2563:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m The find_conversation function.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2564[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2565:Ca[0m[39mll this routine to look up a conversation. If no conversation is found,[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2566[0m[39m:the routine will return a NULL value.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2567[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2568[0m[39m:The find_conversation prototype:[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2569[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2570[0m[39m:    conversation_t *[0m[1;35mfind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t frame_num, address *addr_a,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2571[0m[39m:        address *addr_b, conversation_type ctype, uint32_t port_a, uint32_t [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mport_b,[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2572[0m[39m:        unsigned options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2573[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2574[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2575[0m[39m:    uint32_t frame_num       = a frame number to match[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2576[0m[39m:    address* addr_a          = first address[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2577[0m[39m:    address* addr_b          = second address[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2578[0m[39m:    conversation_type ctype  = conversation type[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2579[0m[39m:    uint32_t port_a          = first data packet port[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2580[0m[39m:    uint32_t port_b          = second data packet port[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2581[0m[39m:    unsigned options         = conversation options, NO_ADDR_B and/or [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNO_PORT_B[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2582[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2583:f[0m[39mrame_num is a frame number to match. The conversation returned is where[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2584[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe_num >= conversation->setup_frame[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2585[0m[39m:    && frame_num < conversation->next->setup_frame[0m[1;39m)[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2586[0m[39m:Suppose there are a total of [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m conversations [0m[1;39m([0m[39mA, B, and C[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that match[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2587:add[0m[39mr_a/port_a and addr_b/port_b, where the setup_frame used in[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2588:c[0m[1;35monversation_new[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for A, B and C are [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m, and [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m respectively. The[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2589:f[0m[39mrame_num passed in find_conversation is compared to the setup_frame of each[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2590:c[0m[39monversation. So if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe_num >= [0m[1;36m10[0m[39m && frame_num < [0m[1;36m50[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, conversation A is[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2591[0m[39m:returned. If [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe_num >= [0m[1;36m50[0m[39m && frame_num < [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, conversation B is returned.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2592[0m[39m:If [0m[1;39m([0m[39mframe_num >= [0m[1;36m100[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m conversation C is returned.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2593[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2594[0m[39m:[0m[32m"addr_a"[0m[39m and [0m[32m"port_a"[0m[39m are the first address/port pair; [0m[32m"addr_b"[0m[39m and[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2595[0m[39m:[0m[32m"port_b"[0m[39m are the second address/port pair. Again, as a conversation[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2596:d[0m[39moesn't have source and destination address/port pairs, so[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2597[0m[39m:[0m[32m"addr_a"[0m[35m/[0m[32m"port_a"[0m[39m may be the source or destination address/port pair;[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2598[0m[39m:[0m[32m"addr_b"[0m[35m/[0m[32m"port_b"[0m[39m would be the other pair. The search will match the[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2599[0m[39m:[0m[32m"a"[0m[39m address/port pair against both the [0m[32m"1"[0m[39m and [0m[32m"2"[0m[39m address/port pairs,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2600:a[0m[39mnd match the [0m[32m"b"[0m[39m address/port pair against both the [0m[32m"2"[0m[39m and [0m[32m"1"[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2601:add[0m[39mress/port pairs; you don't have to worry about which side the [0m[32m"a"[0m[39m or[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2602[0m[39m:[0m[32m"b"[0m[39m pairs correspond to.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2603[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2604[0m[39m:If the NO_ADDR_B flag was specified to [0m[32m"find_conversation[0m[32m([0m[32m)[0m[32m"[0m[39m, the[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2605[0m[39m:[0m[32m"addr_b"[0m[39m address will be treated as matching any [0m[32m"wildcarded"[0m[39m address;[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2606[0m[39m:if the NO_PORT_B flag was specified, the [0m[32m"port_b"[0m[39m port will be treated[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2607:a[0m[39ms matching any [0m[32m"wildcarded"[0m[39m port. If both flags are specified, i.e.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2608[0m[39m:NO_ADDR_B|NO_PORT_B, the [0m[32m"addr_b"[0m[39m address will be treated as matching[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2609:a[0m[39mny [0m[32m"wildcarded"[0m[39m address and the [0m[32m"port_b"[0m[39m port will be treated as[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2610[0m[39m:matching any [0m[32m"wildcarded"[0m[39m port.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2611[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2612:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m The find_conversation_full function.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2613[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2614:Ca[0m[39mll this routine to look up a conversation based on an element list. If[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2615[0m[39m:no conversation is found, the routine will return a NULL value.[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2616[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2617[0m[39m:The find_conversation_full prototype:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2618[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2619[0m[39m:    conversation_t *[0m[1;35mfind_conversation_full[0m[1;39m([0m[39muint32_t frame_num,[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2620[0m[39m:        conversation_element_t *elements[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2621[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2622[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2623[0m[39m:    uint32_t setup_frame             = The lowest numbered frame for[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2624[0m[39m:        this conversation[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2625[0m[39m:    conversation_element_t *elements = An array of data types and[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2626[0m[39m:        values which identify this conversation. The array MUST be[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2627[0m[39m:        terminated with a CE_ENDPOINT element.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2628[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2629:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m6[0m[39m The find_conversation_pinfo function.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2630[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2631[0m[39m:This convenience function will find an existing conversation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mby calling[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2632:f[0m[1;35mind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2633[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2634[0m[39m:The find_conversation_pinfo prototype:[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2635[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2636[0m[39m:    extern conversation_t *[0m[1;35mfind_conversation_pinfo[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpacket_info *pinfo,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2637[0m[39m:        const unsigned options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2638[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2639[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2640[0m[39m:    packet_info *pinfo  = the packet_info structure[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2641[0m[39m:    const unsigned options = conversation options, NO_ADDR_B and/or NO_PORT_B[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2642[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2643[0m[39m:The frame number and the addresses necessary for [0m[1;35mfind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2644[0m[39m:taken from the addresses and ports in the pinfo structure,[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2645[0m[39m:pinfo->conv_addr_port_endpoints if pinfo->use_conv_addr_port_endpoints is set,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2646[0m[39m:or pinfo->conv_elements if it is set.[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2647[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2648:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m The find_or_create_conversation function.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2649[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2650[0m[39m:This convenience function will find an existing conversation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mby calling[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2651:f[0m[1;35mind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and, if a conversation does not already exist, create a[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2652[0m[39m:new conversation by calling [0m[1;35mconversation_new[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2653[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2654[0m[39m:The find_or_create_conversation prototype:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2655[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2656[0m[39m:    extern conversation_t *[0m[1;35mfind_or_create_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpacket_info *pinfo[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2657[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2658[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2659[0m[39m:    packet_info *pinfo = the packet_info structure[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2660[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2661[0m[39m:The frame number and the addresses necessary for [0m[1;35mfind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2662:c[0m[1;35monversation_new[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are taken from the pinfo structure [0m[1;39m([0m[39mas is commonly done[0m[1;39m)[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2663:a[0m[39mnd no [0m[32m'options'[0m[39m are used.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2664[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2665:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m8[0m[39m The conversation_add_proto_data function.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2666[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2667[0m[39m:Once you have created a conversation with conversation_new, you can[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2668:a[0m[39mssociate data with it using this function.[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2669[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2670[0m[39m:The conversation_add_proto_data prototype:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2671[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2672[0m[39m:    void [0m[1;35mconversation_add_proto_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation_t *conv, int proto,[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2673[0m[39m:        void *proto_data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2674[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2675[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2676[0m[39m:    conversation_t *conv    = the conversation in question[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2677[0m[39m:    int proto               = registered protocol number[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2678[0m[39m:    void *data              = dissector data structure[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2679[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2680[0m[39m:[0m[32m"conversation"[0m[39m is the value returned by conversation_new. [0m[32m"proto"[0m[39m is a[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2681[0m[39m:unique protocol number created with proto_register_protocol. Protocols[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2682:a[0m[39mre typically registered in the proto_register_XXXX section of your[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2683:d[0m[39missector. [0m[32m"data"[0m[39m is a pointer to the data you wish to associate with the[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2684:c[0m[39monversation. [0m[32m"data"[0m[39m usually points to [0m[32m"wmem_alloc'd"[0m[39m memory; the[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2685[0m[39m:memory will be automatically freed each time a new dissection begins[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2686:a[0m[39mnd thus need not be managed [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfreed[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m by the dissector.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2687[0m[39m:Using the protocol number allows several dissectors to[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2688:a[0m[39mssociate data with a given conversation.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2689[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2690[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2691:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m9[0m[39m The conversation_get_proto_data function.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2692[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2693:Af[0m[39mter you have located a conversation with find_conversation, you can use[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2694[0m[39m:this function to retrieve any data associated with it.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2695[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2696[0m[39m:The conversation_get_proto_data prototype:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2697[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2698[0m[39m:    void *[0m[1;35mconversation_get_proto_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation_t *conv, int proto[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2699[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2700[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2701[0m[39m:    conversation_t *conv    = the conversation in question[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2702[0m[39m:    int proto               = registered protocol number[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2703[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2704[0m[39m:[0m[32m"conversation"[0m[39m is the conversation created with conversation_new. [0m[32m"proto"[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2705[0m[39m:is a unique protocol number created with proto_register_protocol,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2706[0m[39m:typically in the proto_register_XXXX portion of a dissector. The function[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2707[0m[39m:returns a pointer to the data requested, or NULL if no data was found.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2708[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2709[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2710:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m10[0m[39m The conversation_delete_proto_data function.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2711[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2712:Af[0m[39mter you are finished with a conversation, you can remove your association[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2713[0m[39m:with this function. Please note that ONLY the conversation entry is[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2714[0m[39m:removed. If you have allocated any memory for your data [0m[1;39m([0m[39mother than with [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2715[0m[39m: you must free it as well.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2716[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2717[0m[39m:The conversation_delete_proto_data prototype:[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2718[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2719[0m[39m:    void [0m[1;35mconversation_delete_proto_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation_t *conv, int proto[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2720[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2721[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2722[0m[39m:    conversation_t *conv = the conversation in question[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2723[0m[39m:    int proto            = registered protocol number[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2724[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2725[0m[39m:[0m[32m"conversation"[0m[39m is the conversation created with conversation_new. [0m[32m"proto"[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2726[0m[39m:is a unique protocol number created with proto_register_protocol,[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2727[0m[39m:typically in the proto_register_XXXX portion of a dissector.[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2728[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2729:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.1[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m11[0m[39m The conversation_set_dissector function[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2730[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2731[0m[39m:This function sets the protocol dissector to be invoked whenever[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2732:c[0m[39monversation parameters [0m[1;39m([0m[39maddresses, port_types, ports, etc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are matched[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2733:d[0m[39muring the dissection of a packet.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2734[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2735[0m[39m:The conversation_set_dissector prototype:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2736[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2737[0m[39m:    void [0m[1;35mconversation_set_dissector[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation_t *conversation, const [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdissector_handle_t handle[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2738[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2739[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2740[0m[39m:    conversation_t *conv = the conversation in question[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2741[0m[39m:    const dissector_handle_t handle = the dissector handle.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2742[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2743[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2744:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.2[0m[39m Using timestamps relative to the conversation[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2745[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2746[0m[39m:There is a framework to calculate timestamps relative to the start of the[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2747:c[0m[39monversation. First of all the timestamp of the first packet that has been[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2748[0m[39m:seen in the conversation must be kept in the protocol data to be able[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2749[0m[39m:to calculate the timestamp of the current packet relative to the start[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2750[0m[39m:of the conversation. The timestamp of the last packet that was seen in the[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2751:c[0m[39monversation should also be kept in the protocol data. This way the[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2752:de[0m[39mlta time between the current packet and the previous packet in the[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2753:c[0m[39monversation can be calculated.[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2754[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2755[0m[39m:So add the following items to the struct that is used for the protocol data:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2756[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2757[0m[39m:  nstime_t ts_first;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2758[0m[39m:  nstime_t ts_prev;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2759[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2760[0m[39m:The ts_prev value should only be set during the first run through the[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2761[0m[39m:packets [0m[1;39m([0m[39mie [0m[1;35mPINFO_FD_VISITED[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2762[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2763[0m[39m:Next step is to use the per-packet information [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdescribed in section [0m[1;36m2.5[0m[1;39m)[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2764[0m[39m:to keep the calculated delta timestamp, as it can only be calculated[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2765[0m[39m:on the first run through the packets. This is because a packet can be[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2766[0m[39m:selected in random order once the whole file has been read.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2767[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2768:Af[0m[39mter calculating the conversation timestamps, it is time to put them in[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2769[0m[39m:the appropriate columns with the function [0m[32m'col_set_time'[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdescribed in[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2770[0m[39m:section [0m[1;36m1.5[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m9[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. The column used for relative timestamps is:[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2771[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2772:C[0m[39mOL_REL_TIME, [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Delta time to last frame in conversation *[0m[35m/[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2773[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2774[0m[39m:Last but not least, there MUST be a preference in each dissector that[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2775[0m[39m:uses conversation timestamps that makes it possible to enable and[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2776:d[0m[39misable the calculation of conversation timestamps. The main argument[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2777:f[0m[39mor this is that a higher level conversation is able to overwrite[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2778[0m[39m:the values of lower level conversations in these two columns. Being[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2779:ab[0m[39mle to actively select which protocols may overwrite the conversation[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2780[0m[39m:timestamp columns gives the user the power to control these columns.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2781[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m([0m[39mA second reason is that conversation timestamps use the per-packet[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2782:da[0m[39mta structure which uses additional memory, which should be avoided[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2783[0m[39m:if these timestamps are not needed[0m[1;39m)[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2784[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2785[0m[39m:Have a look at the differences to packet-tcp.[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mch[0m[1;39m][0m[39m in SVN [0m[1;36m22966[0m[39m and[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2786[0m[39m:SVN [0m[1;36m23058[0m[39m to see the implementation of conversation timestamps for[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2787[0m[39m:the tcp-dissector.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2788[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2789[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2790:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.3[0m[39m The example conversation code using wmem_file_scope memory.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2791[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2792:F[0m[39mor a conversation between two IP addresses and ports you can use this as an[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2793:e[0m[39mxample. This example uses [0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m with [0m[1;35mwmem_file_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to allocate[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2794[0m[39m:memory and stores the data pointer in the conversation [0m[32m'data'[0m[39m variable.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2795[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2796[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m************************ Global values ************************[0m[35m/[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2797[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2798[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* define your structure here *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2799[0m[39m:typedef struct [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2800[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2801[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m my_entry_t;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2802[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2803[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* Registered protocol number *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2804[0m[39m:static int my_proto;[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2805[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2806[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m********************* in the dissector routine *********************[0m[35m/[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2807[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2808[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* the local variables in the dissector *[0m[35m/[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2809[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2810:c[0m[39monversation_t *conversation;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2811[0m[39m:my_entry_t *data_ptr;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2812[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2813[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2814[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* look up the conversation *[0m[35m/[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2815[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2816:c[0m[39monversation = [0m[1;35mfind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->num, &pinfo->src, &pinfo->dst,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2817[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mconversation_pt_to_conversation_type[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->ptype[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2818[0m[39m:        pinfo->srcport, pinfo->destport, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2819[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2820[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* if conversation found get the data pointer that you stored *[0m[35m/[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2821[0m[39m:if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2822[0m[39m:    data_ptr = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmy_entry_t*[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mconversation_get_proto_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation, [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmy_proto[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2823[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2824[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2825[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* new conversation create local data structure *[0m[35m/[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2826[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2827[0m[39m:    data_ptr = [0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_file_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmy_entry_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2828[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2829[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m*** add your code here to setup the new data structure ***[0m[35m/[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2830[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2831[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* create the conversation with your data pointer  *[0m[35m/[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2832[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2833[0m[39m:    conversation = [0m[1;35mconversation_new[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->num,  &pinfo->src, &pinfo->dst,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2834[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mconversation_pt_to_conversation_type[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->ptype[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2835[0m[39m:        pinfo->srcport, pinfo->destport, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2836[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mconversation_add_proto_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation, my_proto, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mdata_ptr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2837[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2838[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2839[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* at this point the conversation data is ready *[0m[35m/[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2840[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2841[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m***************** in the protocol register routine *****************[0m[35m/[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2842[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2843[0m[39m:my_proto = [0m[1;35mproto_register_protocol[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"My Protocol"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"My Protocol"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"my_proto"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2844[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2845[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2846:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.4[0m[39m An example conversation code that starts at a specific frame number.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2847[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2848[0m[39m:Sometimes a dissector has determined that a new conversation is needed that[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2849[0m[39m:starts at a specific frame number, when a capture session encompasses multiple[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2850:c[0m[39monversation that reuse the same src/dest ip/port pairs. You can use the[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2851:c[0m[39monversation->setup_frame returned by find_conversation with[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2852[0m[39m:pinfo->num to determine whether or not there already exists a conversation[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2853[0m[39m:that starts at the specific frame number.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2854[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2855[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* in the dissector routine *[0m[35m/[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2856[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2857[0m[39m:    conversation = [0m[1;35mfind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->num, &pinfo->src, &pinfo->dst,[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2858[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mconversation_pt_to_conversation_type[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->ptype[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2859[0m[39m:        pinfo->srcport, pinfo->destport, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2860[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation == NULL || [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation->setup_frame != pinfo->num[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m   [2m                [0m
