[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2861[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* It's not part of any conversation or the returned[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2862[0m[39m:         * conversation->setup_frame doesn't match the current frame[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2863[0m[39m:         * create a new one.[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2864[0m[39m:         *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2865[0m[39m:        conversation = [0m[1;35mconversation_new[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->num, &pinfo->src, &pinfo->dst,[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2866[0m[39m:            [0m[1;35mconversation_pt_to_conversation_type[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->ptype[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2867[0m[39m:            pinfo->srcport, pinfo->destport, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2868[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2869[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2870[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2871:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m2.5[0m[39m The example conversation code using conversation index field.[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2872[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2873[0m[39m:Sometimes the conversation isn't enough to define a unique data storage[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2874[0m[39m:value for the network traffic. For example if you are storing information[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2875:ab[0m[39mout requests carried in a conversation, the request may have an[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2876[0m[39m:identifier that is used to  define the request. In this case the[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2877:c[0m[39monversation and the identifier are required to find the data storage[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2878[0m[39m:pointer. You can use the conversation data structure index value to[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2879[0m[39m:uniquely define the conversation.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2880[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2881[0m[39m:See packet-afs.c for an example of how to use the conversation index. In[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2882[0m[39m:this dissector multiple requests are sent in the same conversation. To store[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2883[0m[39m:information for each request the dissector has an internal hash table based[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2884[0m[39m:upon the conversation index and values inside the request packets.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2885[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2886[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2887[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* in the dissector routine *[0m[35m/[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2888[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2889[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* to find a request value, first lookup conversation to get index *[0m[35m/[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2890[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* then used the conversation index, and request data to find data *[0m[35m/[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2891[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* in the local hash table *[0m[35m/[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2892[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2893[0m[39m:    conversation = [0m[1;35mfind_or_create_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2894[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2895[0m[39m:    request_key.conversation = conversation->index;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2896[0m[39m:    request_key.service = [0m[1;35mpntoh16[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&rxh->serviceId[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2897[0m[39m:    request_key.callnumber = [0m[1;35mpntoh32[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&rxh->callNumber[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2898[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2899[0m[39m:    request_val = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct afs_request_val *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;35mg_hash_table_lookup[0m[1;39m([0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2900[0m[39m:        afs_request_hash, &request_key[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2901[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2902[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* only allocate a new hash element when it's a request *[0m[35m/[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2903[0m[39m:    opcode = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2904[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39m!request_val && !reply[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2905[0m[39m:        new_request_key = [0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_file_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafs_request_key[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2906[0m[39m:        *new_request_key = request_key;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2907[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2908[0m[39m:        request_val = [0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_file_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mafs_request_val[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2909[0m[39m:        request_val -> opcode = [0m[1;35mpntoh32[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&afsh->opcode[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2910[0m[39m:        opcode = request_val->opcode;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2911[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2912[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mg_hash_table_insert[0m[1;39m([0m[39mafs_request_hash, new_request_key, request_val[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2913[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2914[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2915[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2916[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2917:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m3[0m[39m Dynamic conversation dissector registration.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2918[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2919[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2920[0m[39m:NOTE:   This sections assumes that all information is available to[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2921[0m[39m:    create a complete conversation, source port/address and[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2922[0m[39m:    destination port/address. If either the destination port or[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2923[0m[39m:    address is known, see section [0m[1;36m2.4[0m[39m Dynamic server port dissector[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2924[0m[39m:    registration.[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2925[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2926:F[0m[39mor protocols that negotiate a secondary port connection, for example[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2927[0m[39m:packet-msproxy.c, a conversation can install a dissector to handle[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2928[0m[39m:the secondary protocol dissection. After the conversation is created[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2929:f[0m[39mor the negotiated ports use the conversation_set_dissector to define[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2930[0m[39m:the dissection routine.[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2931:Bef[0m[39more we create these conversations or assign a dissector to them we should[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2932:f[0m[39mirst check that the conversation does not already exist and if it exists[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2933[0m[39m:whether it is registered to our protocol or not.[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2934[0m[39m:We should do this because it is uncommon but it does happen that multiple[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2935:d[0m[39mifferent protocols can use the same socketpair during different stages of[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2936:a[0m[39mn application cycle. By keeping track of the frame number a conversation[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2937[0m[39m:was started in Wireshark can still tell these different protocols apart.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2938[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2939[0m[39m:The second argument to conversation_set_dissector is a dissector handle,[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2940[0m[39m:which is created with a call to create_dissector_handle,[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2941[0m[39m:register_dissector, or register_dissector_with_description.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2942[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2943[0m[39m:register_dissector_with_description takes as arguments a string giving a name[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2944:f[0m[39mor the dissector, a string with a human-readable summary of the dissector, a[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2945[0m[39m:pointer to the dissector function, and a protocol ID as returned by[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2946[0m[39m:proto_register_protocol.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2947[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2948[0m[39m:register_dissector takes as arguments a string giving a name for the[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2949:d[0m[39missector, a pointer to the dissector function, and a protocol ID[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2950:a[0m[39ms returned by proto_register_protocol.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2951[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2952:c[0m[39mreate_dissector_handle takes as arguments a pointer to the dissector[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2953:f[0m[39munction and a protocol ID as returned by proto_register_protocol.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2954[0m[39m:It is recommended to use one of the above two functions instead of this one,[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2955[0m[39m:since they allow the dissector to be referenced by name from the command line,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2956:b[0m[39my other dissectors via calls to find_dissector, etc.[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2957[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2958[0m[39m:The protocol ID is the ID for the protocol dissected by the function.[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2959[0m[39m:The function will not be called if the protocol has been disabled by the[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2960[0m[39m:user; instead, the data for the protocol will be dissected as raw data.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2961[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m2962:A[0m[39mn example -[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2963[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2964[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* the handle for the dynamic dissector *[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2965[0m[39m:static dissector_handle_t sub_dissector_handle;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2966[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2967[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* prototype for the dynamic dissector *[0m[35m/[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2968[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35msub_dissector[0m[1;39m([0m[39mtvbuff_t *tvb, packet_info *pinfo, proto_tree [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*tree[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2969[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2970[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* in the main protocol dissector, where the next dissector is setup *[0m[35m/[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2971[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2972[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* if conversation has a data field, create it and load structure *[0m[35m/[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2973[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2974[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* First check if a conversation already exists for this socketpair *[0m[35m/[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2975[0m[39m:    conversation = [0m[1;35mfind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->num,[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2976[0m[39m:                                     &pinfo->src, &pinfo->dst, [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconversation_type,[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2977[0m[39m:                                     src_port, dst_port,  [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2978[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2979[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* If there is no such conversation, or if there is one but for[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2980[0m[39m:   someone else's protocol then we just create a new conversation[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2981[0m[39m:   and assign our protocol to it.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2982[0m[39m:*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2983[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ||[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2984[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation->dissector_handle != sub_dissector_handle[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2985[0m[39m:        new_conv_info = [0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_file_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m_new_conv_info[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2986[0m[39m:        new_conv_info->data1 = value1;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2987[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2988[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* create the conversation for the dynamic port *[0m[35m/[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2989[0m[39m:        conversation = [0m[1;35mconversation_new[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->num,[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2990[0m[39m:                                        &pinfo->src, &pinfo->dst, protocol,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2991[0m[39m:                                        src_port, dst_port, new_conv_info, [0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2992[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2993[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* set the dissector for the new conversation *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2994[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mconversation_set_dissector[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation, sub_dissector_handle[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2995[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2996[0m[39m:    [0m[33m...[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2997[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2998[0m[39m:void[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2999[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mproto_register_PROTOABBREV[0m[1;39m([0m[39mvoid[0m[1;39m)[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3000[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3001[0m[39m:    [0m[33m...[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3002[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3003[0m[39m:    sub_dissector_handle = [0m[1;35mregister_dissector[0m[1;39m([0m[32m"PROTOABBREV"[0m[39m, sub_dissector,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3004[0m[39m:        proto[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3005[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3006[0m[39m:    [0m[33m...[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3007[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3008[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3009:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m Dynamic server port dissector registration.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3010[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3011[0m[39m:NOTE: While this example used both NO_ADDR2 and NO_PORT2 to create a[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3012:c[0m[39monversation with only one port and address set, this isn't a[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3013[0m[39m:requirement. Either the second port or the second address can be set[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3014[0m[39m:when the conversation is created.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3015[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3016:F[0m[39mor protocols that define a server address and port for a secondary[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3017[0m[39m:protocol, a conversation can be used to link a protocol dissector to[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3018[0m[39m:the server port and address. The key is to create the new[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3019:c[0m[39monversation with the second address and port set to the "accept[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3020:a[0m[39mny" values.[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3021[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3022[0m[39m:Some server applications can use the same port for different protocols during[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3023:d[0m[39mifferent stages of a transaction. For example it might initially use SNMP[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3024[0m[39m:to perform some discovery and later switch to use TFTP using the same port.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3025[0m[39m:In order to handle this properly we must first check whether such a[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3026:c[0m[39monversation already exists or not and if it exists we also check whether the[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3027[0m[39m:registered dissector_handle for that conversation is [0m[32m"our"[0m[39m dissector or not.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3028[0m[39m:If not we create a new conversation on top of the previous one and set this [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnew[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3029:c[0m[39monversation to use our protocol.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3030[0m[39m:Since Wireshark keeps track of the frame number where a conversation started[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3031[0m[39m:wireshark will still be able to keep the packets apart even though they do use[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3032[0m[39m:the same socketpair.[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3033[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m([0m[39mSee packet-tftp.c and packet-snmp.c for examples of this[0m[1;39m)[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3034[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3035[0m[39m:There are two support routines that will allow the second port and/or[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3036:add[0m[39mress to be set later.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3037[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3038:c[0m[1;35monversation_set_port2[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation_t *conv, uint32_t port[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3039:c[0m[1;35monversation_set_addr2[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation_t *conv, address addr[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3040[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3041[0m[39m:These routines will change the second address or port for the[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3042:c[0m[39monversation. So, the server port conversation will be converted into a[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3043[0m[39m:more complete conversation definition. Don't use these routines if you[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3044[0m[39m:want to create a conversation between the server and client and retain the[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3045[0m[39m:server port definition, you must create a new conversation.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3046[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3047[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3048:A[0m[39mn example -[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3049[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3050[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* the handle for the dynamic dissector *[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3051[0m[39m:static dissector_handle_t sub_dissector_handle;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3052[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3053[0m[39m:    [0m[33m...[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3054[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3055[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* in the main protocol dissector, where the next dissector is setup *[0m[35m/[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3056[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3057[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* if conversation has a data field, create it and load structure *[0m[35m/[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3058[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3059[0m[39m:    new_conv_info = [0m[1;35mwmem_alloc[0m[1;39m([0m[1;35mwmem_file_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m_new_conv_info[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3060[0m[39m:    new_conv_info->data1 = value1;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3061[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3062[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* create the conversation for the dynamic server address and port      *[0m[35m/[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3063[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* NOTE: The second address and port values don't matter because the    *[0m[35m/[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3064[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* NO_ADDR2 and NO_PORT2 options are set.                               *[0m[35m/[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3065[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3066[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* First check if a conversation already exists for this[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3067[0m[39m:    IP/protocol/port[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3068[0m[39m:*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3069[0m[39m:    conversation = [0m[1;35mfind_conversation[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->num,[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3070[0m[39m:                                     &server_src_addr, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, protocol,[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3071[0m[39m:                                     server_src_port, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, NO_ADDR2 | [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNO_PORT_B[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3072[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3073[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[39m* If there is no such conversation, or if there is one but for[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3074[0m[39m:   someone else's protocol then we just create a new conversation[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3075[0m[39m:   and assign our protocol to it.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3076[0m[39m:*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3077[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation == NULL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m ||[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3078[0m[39m:        [0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation->dissector_handle != sub_dissector_handle[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3079[0m[39m:        conversation = [0m[1;35mconversation_new[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpinfo->num,[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3080[0m[39m:                                        &server_src_addr, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconversation_type,[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3081[0m[39m:                                        server_src_port, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, new_conv_info, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mNO_ADDR2 | NO_PORT2[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3082[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3083[0m[39m:        [0m[35m/[0m[39m* set the dissector for the new conversation *[0m[35m/[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3084[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mconversation_set_dissector[0m[1;39m([0m[39mconversation, sub_dissector_handle[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3085[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3086[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3087:2[0m[39m.[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m Per-packet information.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3088[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3089[0m[39m:Information can be stored for each data packet that is processed by the[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3090:d[0m[39missector. The information is added with the p_add_proto_data function and[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3091[0m[39m:retrieved with the p_get_proto_data function. The data pointers passed into[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3092[0m[39m:the p_add_proto_data are not managed by the proto_data routines, however the[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3093:da[0m[39mta pointer memory scope must match that of the scope parameter.[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3094[0m[39m:The two most common use cases for p_add_proto_data/p_get_proto_data are for[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3095[0m[39m:persistent data about the packet for the lifetime of the capture [0m[1;39m([0m[39mfile scope[0m[1;39m)[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;92m3096:a[0m[39mnd to exchange data between dissectors across a single packet [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpacket scope[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3097[0m[39m:It is also used to provide packet data for Decode As dialog [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpacket scope[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3098[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3099[0m[39m:These functions are declared in <epan/proto_data.h>.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3100[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3101[0m[39m:void[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3102[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mp_add_proto_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem_allocator_t *scope, packet_info *pinfo, int proto, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint32_t key, void *proto_data[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3103[0m[39m:void *[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3104[0m[39m:[0m[1;35mp_get_proto_data[0m[1;39m([0m[39mwmem_allocator_t *scope, packet_info *pinfo, int proto, [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muint32_t key[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3105[0m[39m:[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3106[0m[39m:Where:[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3107[0m[39m:    scope      - Lifetime of the data to be stored, typically [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mwmem_file_scope[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3108[0m[39m:                 or pinfo->pool [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpacket scope[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. Must match scope of data[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3109[0m[39m:                 allocated.[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3110[0m[39m:    pinfo      - The packet info pointer.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3111[0m[39m:    proto      - Protocol id returned by the proto_register_protocol call[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3112[0m[39m:                 during initialization[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3113[0m[39m:    key        - key associated with [0m[32m'proto_data'[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1100[0m[39m:              * XXX - we really want the "show data a[0m                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m76[0m[39m:  struct conversation_element *conv_elements; [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< Arbitrary conversation [0m       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m77[0m[39m:  uint16_t can_desegment;            [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< >[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m if this segment could be [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdesegmented.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m78[0m[39m:                                         A dissector that can offer this API [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g.[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m79[0m[39m:                                         TCP[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m sets [0m[33mcan_desegment[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, then[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m80[0m[39m:                                         can_desegment is decremented by [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m each [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtime[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m81[0m[39m:                                         we pass to the next subdissector. Thus [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39monly[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m82[0m[39m:                                         the dissector immediately above the[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m83[0m[39m:                                         protocol which sets the flag can use [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mit*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m84[0m[39m:  uint16_t saved_can_desegment;      [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< Value of can_desegment before current[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m85[0m[39m:                                         dissector was called.  Supplied so that[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m86[0m[39m:                                         dissectors for proxy protocols such as[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m87[0m[39m:                                         SOCKS can restore it, allowing the[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m88[0m[39m:                                         dissectors that they call to use the[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m89[0m[39m:                                         TCP dissector's desegmentation [0m[1;39m([0m[39mSOCKS[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m90[0m[39m:                                         just retransmits TCP segments once it's[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m91[0m[39m:                                         finished setting things up, so the TCP[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m92[0m[39m:                                         desegmentor can desegment its payload[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m93[0m[39m:  int desegment_offset;             [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< offset to stuff needing desegmentation [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m*[0m[35m/[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m94[0m[39m:#define DESEGMENT_ONE_MORE_SEGMENT [0m[1;36m0x0fffffff[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m95[0m[39m:#define DESEGMENT_UNTIL_FIN        [0m[1;36m0x0ffffffe[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m96[0m[39m:  uint32_t desegment_len;            [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< requested desegmentation additional [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m97[0m[39m:                                       or[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m98[0m[39m:                                       DESEGMENT_ONE_MORE_SEGMENT:[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m99[0m[39m:                                         Desegment one more full segment[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m100[0m[39m:                                         [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwarning! only partially implemented[0m[1;39m)[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m101[0m[39m:                                       DESEGMENT_UNTIL_FIN:[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m102[0m[39m:                                         Desegment all data for this tcp [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msession[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m103[0m[39m:                                         until the FIN segment.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m104[0m[39m:                                    *[0m[35m/[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m105[0m[39m:  uint16_t want_pdu_tracking;    [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< >[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m if the subdissector has specified[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m106[0m[39m:                                   a value in [0m[32m'bytes_until_next_pdu'[0m[39m.[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m107[0m[39m:                                   When a dissector detects that the next PDU[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m108[0m[39m:                                   will start beyond the start of the next[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m109[0m[39m:                                   segment, it can set this value to [0m[1;36m2[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m110[0m[39m:                                   and [0m[32m'bytes_until_next_pdu'[0m[39m to the number of[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m111[0m[39m:                                   bytes beyond the next segment where the[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m112[0m[39m:                                   next PDU starts.[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m113[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m114[0m[39m:                                   If the protocol dissector below this[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m115[0m[39m:                                   one is capable of PDU tracking it can[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m116[0m[39m:                                   use this hint to detect PDUs that starts[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m117[0m[39m:                                   unaligned to the segment boundaries.[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m118[0m[39m:                                   The TCP dissector is using this hint from[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m119[0m[39m:                                   [0m[1;39m([0m[39msome[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m protocols to detect when a new PDU[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m120[0m[39m:                                   starts in the middle of a tcp segment.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m121[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m122[0m[39m:                                   There is intelligence in the glue between[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m123[0m[39m:                                   dissector layers to make sure that this[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m124[0m[39m:                                   request is only passed down to the protocol[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m125[0m[39m:                                   immediately below the current one and not[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m126[0m[39m:                                   any further.[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m127[0m[39m:                                *[0m[35m/[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m128[0m[39m:  uint32_t bytes_until_next_pdu;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m129[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m130[0m[39m:  int     p2p_dir;              [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< Packet was captured as an[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m131[0m[39m:                                       outbound [0m[1;39m([0m[39mP2P_DIR_SENT[0m[1;39m)[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m132[0m[39m:                                       inbound [0m[1;39m([0m[39mP2P_DIR_RECV[0m[1;39m)[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m133[0m[39m:                                       unknown [0m[1;39m([0m[39mP2P_DIR_UNKNOWN[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m134[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m135[0m[39m:  GHashTable *private_table;    [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< a hash table passed from one dissector to [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39manother *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m136[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m137[0m[39m:  wmem_list_t *layers;          [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< layers of each protocol *[0m[35m/[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m138[0m[39m:  wmem_map_t *proto_layers;     [0m[35m/[0m[39m** map of proto_id to curr_proto_layer_num. *[0m[35m/[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m139[0m[39m:  uint8_t curr_layer_num;        [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< The current [0m[32m"depth"[0m[39m or layer number in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe current frame *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m140[0m[39m:  uint8_t curr_proto_layer_num;  [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< The current [0m[32m"depth"[0m[39m or layer number for [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis dissector in the current frame *[0m[35m/[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m141[0m[39m:  uint16_t link_number;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m142[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m143[0m[39m:  uint16_t clnp_srcref;          [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< clnp/cotp source reference [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcan't use [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrcport, this would confuse tpkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m144[0m[39m:  uint16_t clnp_dstref;          [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< clnp/cotp destination reference [0m[1;39m([0m[39mcan't [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39muse dstport, this would confuse tpkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m145[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m146[0m[39m:  int link_dir;                 [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< 3GPP messages are sometime different UP [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35mlink[0m[1;39m([0m[39mUL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m or [0m[1;35mDownlink[0m[1;39m([0m[39mDL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m *[0m[35m/[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m147[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m148[0m[39m:  int16_t src_win_scale;        [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< Rcv.Wind.Shift src applies when sending [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msegments; [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m unknown; [0m[1;36m-2[0m[39m disabled *[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m149[0m[39m:  int16_t dst_win_scale;        [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< Rcv.Wind.Shift dst applies when sending [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msegments; [0m[1;36m-1[0m[39m unknown; [0m[1;36m-2[0m[39m disabled *[0m[35m/[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m150[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m151[0m[39m:  GSList* proto_data;          [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< Per packet proto data *[0m[35m/[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m152[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m153[0m[39m:  GSList* frame_end_routines;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m154[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m155[0m[39m:  wmem_allocator_t *pool;      [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< Memory pool scoped to the pinfo struct *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m156[0m[39m:  struct epan_session *epan;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m157[0m[39m:  const char *heur_list_name;    [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< name of heur list if this packet is being[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheuristically dissected *[0m[35m/[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m158[0m[39m:  int dissection_depth;         [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< The current [0m[32m"depth"[0m[39m or layer number in the[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcurrent frame *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m159[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m160[0m[39m:  uint32_t stream_id;            [0m[35m/[0m[39m**< Conversation Stream ID of the highest [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mprotocol *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m161[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m packet_info;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1248[0m[39m:           NULL, [0m[1;36m0x0[0m[39m, NULL, HFILL [0m[1;39m}[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m,[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1249[0m[39m:         [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1250[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m &hf_irc_request_command_whois_name, [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m [0m[32m"Name"[0m[39m, [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [32m"irc.request.command.whois.name"[0m[39m, FT_STRING, BASE_NONE,[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1251[0m[39m:           NULL, [0m[1;36m0x0[0m[39m, NULL, HFILL [0m[1;39m}[0m[1;39m}[0m[39m,[0m                                          [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1292[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m &hf_irc_request_command_param, [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m [0m[32m"Parameter"[0m[39m, [0m                      [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1295[0m[39m:         [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m &hf_irc_request_trailer, [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m [0m[32m"Trailer"[0m[39m, [0m[32m"irc.request.trailer"[0m[39m, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFT_STRING, BASE_NONE,[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
